{"cells":[{"cell_type":"markdown","source":["# Tapshiriq: Python Data Tipleri"],"metadata":{}},{"cell_type":"code","source":["# 1. Muspet/menfi yoxlama
eded = int(input('Eded daxil edin: '))
if eded > 0:
    print('Muspet')
elif eded < 0:
    print('Menfi')
else:
    print('Sifir')"],"metadata":{},"execution_count":null,"outputs":[]},{"cell_type":"code","source":["# 2. Iki eded emeliyyatlari
a = 15
b = 7
print(f'Cem: {a + b}')
print(f'Ferq: {a - b}')
print(f'Hasil: {a * b}')"],"metadata":{},"execution_count":null,"outputs":[]},{"cell_type":"code","source":["# 3. Daire sahesi
import math
radius = 5
sahe = math.pi * radius ** 2
print(f'Sahe: {sahe:.2f}')"],"metadata":{},"execution_count":null,"outputs":[]},{"cell_type":"code","source":["# 4. Orta hesablama
numbers = [10, 20, 30, 40, 50]
orta = sum(numbers) / len(numbers)
print(f'Orta: {orta}')"],"metadata":{},"execution_count":null,"outputs":[]},{"cell_type":"code","source":["# 5. String emeliyyatlari
ad = 'Python'
print(ad.upper())
print(ad.lower())
print(ad[::-1])"],"metadata":{},"execution_count":null,"outputs":[]}],"metadata":{"kernelspec":{"language":"python"}},"nbformat":4,"nbformat_minor":5}
taskInstructions: 1) Istifadechiden eded daxil edin muspet/menfi yoxlayin 2) Iki eded ile emeliyyatlar 3) Dairenin sahesi 4) Siyahida orta 5) String emeliyyatlari
